alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:18PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chickasaw and southeastern Calhoun Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 518 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mantee, or 12 miles southwest of Houston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houston, Vardaman, Trebloc, Pyland, Woodland, Tabbville, Sparta, McCondy, Anchor, Atlanta and Parkersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
